title: Gatorade Font
content:
Hello, I neeed a Gatorade font or logo to copy onto my gatorade bolt, of course all credit of the gatorade bolt and font/logo will be given to Gatorade, but i will include you in my small credits.

So yeah, if anyone can I'd really appriciate it!
author: Charger875

comments.content:
Just grab the whole thing as an EPS [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20111214100043/http:/brandsoftheworld.com/search/?query_id=99476&page=1&mtype=&brand_id=37850).

Also, this thread is usually reserved for critique, not requests. Try the 'General Discussions' thread. It also has more traffic.
